title: The Phantom Twin
description: Isabel and Jane are the Extraordinary Peabody Sisters, conjoined twins in a traveling carnival freak showâ€”until an ambitious surgeon tries to separate them and fails, causing Jane's death.Isabel has lost an arm and a leg but gained a ghostly Her dead twin is now her phantom limb. Haunted, altered, and alone for the first time, can Isabel build a new life that's truly her own?
author: Lisa Brown
